price: Nagsabi sila: “Bagkus nakatagpo kami sa mga magulang namin na gumagawa ng gayon.”
arabic: قَالُواْ بَلۡ وَجَدۡنَآ ءَابَآءَنَا كَذَٰلِكَ يَفۡعَلُونَ

version.title: Filipino (Tagalog) Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tagalog by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: qālū bal wajadnā ābāanā kadhālika yafʿalūna
